name: Hike to Lovćen Peak
description:
Time: 8:45am
Return: 5pm but could be earlier
Place: Meet outside Chedi Hotel
Description: Join together for a challenging ascent up to the Lovćen Peak starting in Kotor. Hike 15km with 1600m Elevation Gain, and a bus will bring us back down from close to the peak to Lustica Bay
Remember to:
Bring 30 eur for transportation, and entry to the park
Wear appropriate footwear & clothing (have potentially wet weather gear)
Pack your own snacks/lunch
Pack at least 1 Liter of water
